providers.doc: Manage HTTP Basic and Digest authentication files
providers.name: httpauth

types.doc: Manage HTTP Basic or Digest password files.    httpauth { 'user':                           file => '/path/to/password/file',          password => 'password',                    mechanism => basic,                        ensure => present,                       }
types.name: httpauth

parameters.doc: The name of the user to be managed.
parameters.name: name

parameters.doc: The HTTP password file to be managed. If it doesn't exist it is created.
parameters.name: file

parameters.doc: The realm - defaults to nil and mainly used for Digest authentication.
parameters.name: realm

parameters.doc: The authentication mechanism to use - either basic or digest. Default to basic.  Valid values are `basic`, `digest`.
parameters.name: mechanism

author: puppet
summary: Puppet type for managing HTTP Basic and Digest auth files, a la htpasswd.
name: puppet-httpauth
